column6: Smart Waste Management For metropolitan Cities  Recommender App

column4: Verify  user is able to see the Login/Signup popup when user clicked on My account button
column6:
1.Enter URL and click go
2.Click on My Account dropdown button
3.Verify login/Singup popup displayed or not

column4: Verify the UI elements in Login/Signup popup
column6:
1.Enter URL and click go
2.Click on My Account dropdown button
3.Verify login/Singup popup with below UI elements:
a.email text box
b.password text box
c.Login button
d.New customer? Create account link
e.Last password? Recovery password link
column8:
Application should show below UI elements:
a.email text box
b.password text box
c.Login button with orange colour
d.New customer? Create account link
e.Last password? Recovery password link

column4: Verify user is able to log into application with Valid credentials
column6:
1.Enter URL(index.html) and click go
2.Click on My Account dropdown button
3.Enter Valid username/email in Email text box
4.Enter valid password in password text box
5.Click on login button
column8: User should navigate to user account homepage

4.Enter valid password in password text box

column8: Application should show 'Incorrect email or password ' validation message.
